name: Kuakata
description: Kuakata is a panoramic sea beach on the southernmost tip of Bangladesh. Located in the Patuakhali district.

name: Sajek
description: Sajek Valley is known for its natural environment and is surrounded by green mountains, dense forests, and hilly terrain.

name: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is one of the longest sea beaches in the world. It's a sandy beach with an unbroken 155 Km length.

name: Sreemangal
description: Sreemangal is often referred to as the 'tea capital' of Bangladesh, and is most famous for its tea fields.

name: Bandarban
description: This is the highest natural lake of Bangladesh. It is 3000fts above sea level & 18km away from Ruma Sadar Upazilla.

name: Tanguar Haor
description: Tanguar Haor, a massive wetland, is located between Dhormopasha and Tahirpur Upazilas in the Sunamganj district of greater Sylhet.

name: Saint Martin
description: St. Martin is one of the most beautiful visiting places of Bangladesh. It has fresh blue water with corals, beautiful sandy beaches.

name: Rangamati
description: It is surrounded by Tripura of India at north, Bandarban at south, Mizoram of India at east and Khagrachari & Chittagong at west.

name: Jaflong
description: Jaflong (Bengali: জাফলং) is a hill station and tourist destination in the Division of Sylhet, Bangladesh.
